about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Learn more about my development journey and passion in technology
about.description: Software Developer with 3 years of experience in web and mobile development using React, React Native, Next.js and Laravel. Skilled in building responsive, high-performance user interfaces and experienced in VoIP SIP system integration. Passionate about writing clean, maintainable code and continuously improving product quality.

mudbathNextjs.title: Mudbath - Next.js Developer
mudbathNextjs.period: May 2024 - July 2024 | New South Wales, Australia

achievements: Integrated dynamic content with Contentful CMS
Collaborated with design and marketing teams

mudbathReactNative.title: Mudbath - React Native Developer
mudbathReactNative.period: Feb 2024 - May 2024 | New South Wales, Australia
mudbathReactNative.tech: Tech: TS, ReactJs, Serverless, AWS IOT Core, AWS Lambda Function, AWS API Gateway, AWS DynamoDB, AWS Cognito
achievements: Migrate UI from Aurelia to ReactJs
Update API endpoint and lambda function

mudbathLaravel.title: Mudbath - Laravel Developer
mudbathLaravel.period: Sep 2023 - Feb 2024 | New South Wales, Australia
mudbathLaravel.tech: Tech: PHP, JS, VueJs, Contentful, Algolia
achievements: Migration from Laravel 7 to 9 & Contentful version
Resolve Docker pipeline and Docker problems, address cybersecurity issues, and fix sitemap issues

mudbathETL.title: Mudbath - ETL Developer
mudbathETL.period: Oct 2023 - Nov 2023 | New South Wales, Australia
mudbathETL.tech: Tech: TS, React Native, Redux, Redux Thunk, Azure Functions, Contentful
achievements: Configured and managed Contentful webhooks for triggering Azure Functions that generate JSON files containing view models customized for different languages.
Optimized the performance of ETL functions to ensure the efficient and timely delivery of localized content to end-users.
